name: VS. Lightning
description:
Console game programmed with C#.

Features two game modes,  both revolving around avoiding lightning strikes and the pain associated.

In the normal mode there are more skills available, upgrades for skills and lightning volume and speed increases as the game progresses. This game introduces some strategic choices and tests the use of multiple skills in addition to dodging.

In the neverending mode, only the shield skill is available, however the characters speed has been cranked to the maximum. The difficulty is static and the game doesn't end if the player manages to survive. This game mode focuses on the skill of dodging lightning rays quickly.
